description: '''Asian Dub Foundation''' ('''ADF''') is an English [[electronic music]] band that combines musical styles including [[rap rock]], [[dub music|dub]], [[dancehall]], [[ragga]], ReggaeEDM, and [[Asian underground|South Asian music]]. The group also includes traditional rock instruments such as electric bass and guitar, which acknowledges a [[punk rock]] influence. Their music is known for its dub-inspired basslines, guitar parts inspired by the traditional Indian instrument the [[sitar]], and fast rapping.
